title: Old, not ill: scientist opts for Swiss suicide
text:
Old, not ill: scientist opts for Swiss suicide 4:59pm BST - 01:18
A 104-year-old Australian scientist has ended his own life by assisted suicide in Switzerland. The scientist was not terminally ill, but said he suffered from deteriorating health.
A 104-year-old Australian scientist has ended his own life by assisted suicide in Switzerland. The scientist was not terminally ill, but said he suffered from deteriorating health. //reut.rs/2G0Hdh7
